source: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_SEQ_00<tab>Midnight Dew appears to be chewing her perfectly painted lips.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_SEQ_00<tab>Nächtlicher Tau ist immer noch sichtbar erbost, weil man ihre Einnahmen und Waren gestohlen hat.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_SEQ_01<tab>Midnight Dew's comrades have sighted an empty skiff moored along the cliffs to the south, and believe it to be the getaway craft of the thieves who stole her stock. She plans to head south of Saint Mocianne's Arboretum to cut off the bandits from their means of escape, and asks you to meet with her there to help her hunt them down.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_SEQ_01<tab>Nächtlicher Tau hat von einem verdächtigen Boot südlich des Arboretum-Sees gehört. Sind das die Diebe? Triff dich mit Nächtlicher Tau an der Südseite des Sees.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_SEQ_02<tab>You rendezvous with Midnight Dew amid the ruins of the Answering Quarter. With the skiff still empty and no sign of the bandits in the vicinity, she concludes that they must be holed up in the hills. She proposes that you head up into the hills to flush the thieves out while she stands guard against their escape.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_SEQ_02<tab>Die Diebe könnten sich in der Schlucht im Westen versteckt haben. Sieh dich dort einmal um.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_SEQ_03<tab>You head up into the hills to find the bandits, but the bandits find you first. A pair of burgling blackguards attempt to ambush you in a narrow pass and you are forced to cut them down. Return to Midnight Dew south of Saint Mocianne's Arboretum to inform her of all that befell.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_SEQ_03<tab>Du bist in der Schlucht auf zwei der Diebe gestoßen und hast sie erledigt. Kehre zu Nächtlicher Tau zurück.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_SEQ_04<tab>Midnight Dew is pleased to hear that you have brought another two bandits to justice, and relieved that it was an able adventurer like you that fell into their trap, and not one of her goblin comrades. With several bandits still on the loose and half her property still in their hands, she asks that you continue to lend her your invaluable assistance to track down the last of the thieves.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_SEQ_04<tab>Nächtlicher Tau hat auch einen Dieb erwischt. Dabei soll etwas passiert sein ... Sprich sie noch einmal an, um die ganze Geschichte zu hören.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_TODO_00<tab>Rendezvous with Midnight Dew south of Saint Mocianne's Arboretum.
TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_TODO_01<tab>Search for the thieves in the western Dravanian hinterlands.
TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_TODO_02<tab>Report to Midnight Dew south of Saint Mocianne's Arboretum.

TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_000<tab>I've just had word from my crew─they've sighted an empty skiff roped up along the cliffs to the south. The bandits must've been plannin' to lower their loot down into it and sail away into the sunset.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_000<tab>Diese verfluchten Langfinger ... Aber meine Freundin, die Fischerin, hat sich gemeldet. Sie hat einen verdächtigen Kutter auf einem der Flüsse weiter südlich gesehen. Der muss den feigen Banditen gehören.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_001<tab>The boat's moored south of Saint Mocianne's Arboretum. I'm headin' down there now─are you comin', or what?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_001<tab>Triff mich an der Südseite des Sees. Ich wette, die Diebe treiben sich noch in der Gegend herum.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_010<tab>The boat's still there, but no sign of the bandits. Chances are they've holed 'emselves up somewhere in the mountains. I'll stay down here and keep lookout. Meanwhile, I'd have you head up into those hills and see if you can flush 'em out!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_010<tab>Hier ist keiner zu sehen ... Wahrscheinlich haben sie sich irgendwo versteckt. Wehe, ich bekomm einen von denen in meine Finger ... Versuch du dein Glück in der Schlucht westlich von hier. Das scheint ein geeignetes Versteck zu sein.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_020<tab>We've got 'em by the balls now, adventurer! They're up in those hills somewhere, I just know it! Go and see if you can flush 'em out─I'll stay down here and keep watch.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_020<tab>Ich seh mich hier mal um. Wehe, ich bekomm einen von denen in meine Finger ... Versuch du dein Glück in der Schlucht westlich von hier. Das scheint ein geeignetes Versteck zu sein.

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_BALLOON_000_105I'll stick this blade where
the sun don't shine!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_BALLOON_000_105<tab>Jetzt zeig ich dir, warum sie mich den Schlitzer nennen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_030<tab>What!? The bandits ambushed you? No offense, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>, but I'm glad it was you I sent up into those hills, and not one of my gobbie mates. They wouldn't have lasted five minutes, but you...well, there ain't a scratch on you!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_030<tab>Die Diebe haben dich überfallen? Feiglinge! Hast du ihnen auch eine Lektion erteilt?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_031<tab>And another two bandits down, eh? That skiff of theirs held eight, so there can't be many left to catch now. Can I count on you to see this through to the end, adventurer?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ834_01964_MIDNIGHTDEW_000_031<tab>Ich bin auch auf einen von ihnen gestoßen ... Dabei ist mir ein kleines Malheur passiert. Sprich mich noch mal an, dann erzähl ich's dir.
